title: Linear skill (API wrapper)
description: Create a Linear skill that replaces the need for Linear MCP. Uses curl to interact with Linear API. Progressive disclosure architecture: SKILL.md router + workflows for common operations. Note: Linear has no official CLI, so use API via curl with stored API key.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create SKILL.md router (~50 lines) with workflow references
Create workflows/create-issue.md for new issue creation
Create workflows/create-worktree.md to create git worktree from Linear issue
Store Linear API key in 1Password, retrieve via op CLI
All API calls use curl with proper GraphQL queries
Error handling for API failures and missing credentials
